ps.description: search parameters in AWS SSM Parameter Store

disable-decryption.name: disable-decryption
disable-decryption.description: disable decryption of SecureString type params by default

max-results.name: max-results
max-results.description: limit for amount of results returned, default is 50

no-limit.name: no-limit
no-limit.description: retrieve every parameter for the search term

all.name: all
all.description: retrieve every parameter in the region

no-truncate.name: no-truncate
no-truncate.description: do not truncate output to fit screen

sm.description: search parameters in AWS Secrets Manager
examples:
$ asap sm -t awesome-param
awesome param value

max-results.name: max-results
max-results.description: limit for amount of results returned, default is 50

no-limit.name: no-limit
no-limit.description: retrieve every parameter for the search term

all.name: all
all.description: retrieve every parameter in the region

no-truncate.name: no-truncate
no-truncate.description: do not truncate output to fit screen
